title: support ticket
body: how long does it usually take to response to a support ticket?

replies.body:
Do u mind checking out my ticket as well?
TICKET #32064302
It depends on where it's being fielded to, but the queues shouldn't be too long in general at the moment.  Toss me your ticket number, I'm happy to check on the status for you.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ZiUN3xtp,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-06T22:47:29.538+0000)
>
> It depends on where it's being fielded to, but the queues shouldn't be too long in general at the moment.  Toss me your ticket number, I'm happy to check on the status for you.

Then can you tell WOOKIEECOOKIE to look at mine while you are at it. It is still open and haven't gotten any message in about a week and a half no reply not even a courtesy message to say he is working on it.

TICKET #31820899
Your ticket is still open, and is being reviewed as mentioned in the ticket.  Hang tight and you'll receive a response as soon as possible.
Thanks!  I was able to verify that your ticket was received, and fielded to the proper team.  A specialist will get back to you as soon as they can.
